title: Booker T Washington National Monument: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       There are no lodging facilities available at the Park.   For more information on local lodging, please check with the local Chambers of Commerce:   Smith Mountain Lake Area Chamber of Commerence 16430 Booker T. Washington Hwy Suite 2 Moneta, VA 24121 (540)721-1203 http://www.visitsmithmountainlake.com   Bedford Area Chamber of Commerce 305 East Main Street Bedford, VA 24523 (540) 586-9401 http://www.bedfordareachamber.com   Franklin County, VA 1255 Franklin Street Rocky Mount, VA 24151  (540)483-3030 http://www.franklincountyva.org   Roanoke Regional Chamber of Commerce 210 S. Jefferson St. Roanoke, VA 24011-1702 (540)983-0700 http://www.roanokechamber.org   City of Roanoke http://www.roanokeva.gov http://www.visitroanokeva.com   Additional information for both the local area and beyond can be found on the Virginia Tourism and Government sites below:    http://www.virginia.org http://portal.virginia.gov/visit
